Setting.Name: Condition
Setting.Help: Internet Explorer specific condition. All valid conditional expressions are allowd, for example "LT IE 7", "gte IE 7" or "(IE 6)|(IE 7)". See MS MSDN Library for more information.

Setting.Name: IsFirst
Setting.Help: Boolean value that defines whether the stylesheet link should be loaded as first link or not. If false, the link will be added as last.

Setting.Name: Name
Setting.Help: String value that will define the ID of the stylesheet link

Setting.Name: StyleSheet
Setting.Help: String value that contains the path to the style sheet that needs to be loaded. The path is relative to the root of the application.

Setting.Name: UseSkinPath
Setting.Help: Boolean value that, if set to true, will make the reference to the Stylesheet relative to the path of the skin.
